alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 1:30PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County, Jackson County and Oglala Lakota County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to snow this evening, with up to an inch of snow possible. Motorist can expect slick roads tonight as temperatures fall below freezing, combined with the snowfall.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
